Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entire game world. (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game).

      • map

        private org.newdawn.slick.tiled.TiledMap map
        The world map (two dimensional grid of tiles). The concept of tiles is a private implementation detail to World. All public methods deal with pixels, not tiles.

        The player's kart.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(double rotate_dir,
                   double move_dir,
                   int delta,
                   boolean use_item)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the game state for a frame.
        Parameters:
        rotate_dir - The player's direction of rotation (-1 for anti-clockwise, 1 for clockwise, or 0).
        move_dir - The player's movement in the car's axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        use_item - Check if player has pressed ctrl to use item.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Render the entire screen, so it reflects the current game state.
        Parameters:
        g - The Slick graphics object, used for drawing.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • frictionAt

        public double frictionAt(Point pos)
        Get the friction coefficient of a map location.
        Parameters:
        pos - The point to calculate the friction coefficient.
        Returns:
        Friction coefficient at that location.

      • checkBlocks

        public boolean checkBlocks(Point pos)
        Determines whether a particular map location blocks movement.
        Parameters:
        pos - The point to check if the it's blocked
        Returns:
        true if the tile at that location blocks movement.

      • checkCollisions

        public Kart checkCollisions(Point pos,
                            Kart kartA)
        Determines whether a kart is within 40 pixels of a specific point.
        Parameters:
        pos - The point to check if the kart collides.
        kartA - The kart that is checking for collision.
        Returns:
        The kart that is collided with the point.

      • updateHazards

        public void updateHazards(double delta,
                          World world)
        Update all the hazards except for the ones that were destroyed already
        Parameters:
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        world - The world the kart is on (to get friction and blocking).

      • updateItems

        private void updateItems(World world,
                         int delta,
                         boolean use_item)
                  throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update all the items
        Parameters:
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        world - The world the player is on (to get friction and blocking).
        use_item - Check if player uses the item.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
